title: Session 164: Do Relationships Have to Be Hard Work?
itunes:title: Session 164: Do Relationships Have to Be Hard Work?
description:
Dr. Lexx and I chatted about where these messages about partnership come from, what she considers the real work of partnership to be, 4 warning signs you want to be on the lookout for in your relationship, and she shares what vulnerability looks like in a partnership.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: The Therapy for Black Girls Podcast is a weekly conversation with Dr. Joy Harden Bradford, a Licensed Psychologist in Atlanta, Georgia, about all things mental health, personal development, and all the small decisions we can make to become the best...
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts and Joy Harden Bradford, Ph.D.
